TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit LayoutEngine extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于实现布局引擎的基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for implementing layout engines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类在你想要在运行时创建自定义布局行为。Use the class when you want to create custom layout behavior at run time. 派生您自己的类从类并重写方法用来定义你的自定义布局的行为。Derive your own class from the class and override the method to define your custom layout behavior. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类，以实现自定义布局行为。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to implement custom layout behavior. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/cpp/DemoFlowLayout.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/CS/DemoFlowLayout.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/VB/DemoFlowLayout.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

para.span: 布局行为应为相同的布局引擎关联的容器任何的类实例。

span.span: Layout behavior should be the same for any instance of your layout engine's associated container class.

para.span: 为此，请考虑声明布局引擎的构造函数或，和实现你作为一个单独的类的布局引擎。

span.span: For this reason, consider declaring your layout engine's constructor or , and implementing your layout engine as a singleton class.

span.span: The container on which the layout engine will operate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据需要提供中的初始化逻辑方法。Optionally provide initialization logic in the method.

exception.span: 不是一个 可在其上执行布局的类型。

span.span: is not a type on which can perform layout.

para.span: 重写方法以提供自定义初始化行为。

span.span: Override the method to provide your custom initialization behavior.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Layout (object container, System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs layoutEventArgs);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Layout(object container, class System.Windows.Forms.LayoutEventArgs layoutEventArgs) cil managed
public: virtual bool Layout(System::Object ^ container, System::Windows::Forms::LayoutEventArgs ^ layoutEventArgs);

param.name: container
param.span: 布局引擎将在其上执行操作的容器。

span.span: The container on which the layout engine will operate.

param.name: layoutEventArgs
param.span: 来自 事件的事件参数。

span.span: An event argument from a event.

summary.span: 请求布局引擎执行布局操作。

span.span: Requests that the layout engine perform a layout operation.

returns.span: 如果 的父容器应重新执行布局，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if layout should be performed again by the parent of ; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要对执行布局操作的布局引擎时调用此方法`container`参数。This method is called when the layout engine is to perform a layout operation on the `container` parameter. 你可以检查的值， ，和属性`layoutEventArgs`来决定是否需要布局操作。You can check the value of the , , and properties on `layoutEventArgs` to decide if a layout operation is necessary. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法来实现自定义布局行为。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to implement custom layout behavior. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/cpp/DemoFlowLayout.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/CS/DemoFlowLayout.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Layout.LayoutEngine/VB/DemoFlowLayout.vb#4)]

exception.span: 不是一个 可在其上执行布局的类型。

span.span: is not a type on which can perform layout.

para.span: 重写方法以提供您的自定义布局的行为。

span.span: Override the method to provide your custom layout behavior.

para.span: 当布局的内容时参数，请务必检查的每个子控件的属性。

span.span: When laying out the contents of the parameter, be sure to check the property of each child control.

para.span: 返回如果你的布局引擎逻辑确定该布局应重新执行由父容器。

span.span: Return if your layout engine logic determines that layout should be performed again by the parent of the container.

para.span: 例如，这可能是时的布局引擎调整子控件的大小并确定，容器必须增大的大小，以容纳新的布局。

span.span: This might occur, for example, when the layout engine resizes child controls and determines that the container must be increased in size to accommodate the new layout.
